hero.title: Medical Negligence Specialist Lawyers
hero.subtitle: Defending patient rights since 1968
hero.description: Over 55 years of experience in healthcare law. We listen to you, analyze your case and guide you through the entire process.

services.title: Types of Medical Negligence
services.subtitle: Specialization in all areas of medical malpractice

surgical-errors.title: Surgical Errors
surgical-errors.description: Negligence during procedures: forgotten instruments, wrong-site surgery, nerve injuries.

diagnostic-errors.title: Diagnostic Errors
diagnostic-errors.description: Late, incorrect or missed diagnoses that cause treatment delays.

hospital-negligence.title: Hospital Negligence
hospital-negligence.description: Nosocomial infections, falls, pressure ulcers, protocol failures.

obstetric-negligence.title: Obstetric Negligence
obstetric-negligence.description: Birth injuries: cerebral palsy, brachial plexus injuries, hypoxia.

medication-errors.title: Medication Errors
medication-errors.description: Incorrect doses, contraindicated medications, preventable adverse reactions.

informed-consent.title: Informed Consent
informed-consent.description: Lack of information about risks, unauthorized procedures.

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: A clear and transparent process from first contact

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: We analyze your case. We explain your legal options and the viability of the claim.

step2.title: Expert Analysis
step2.description: We review all medical documentation with specialist experts who will determine if there was negligence.

step3.title: Out-of-Court Claim
step3.description: We try to resolve the case through direct negotiation with the insurer or healthcare center.

step4.title: Judicial Procedure
step4.description: If necessary, we take your case to trial with a specialized and experienced legal team.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Professionals dedicated to healthcare law with vocation and commitment to the patient

hero.title: Lawyers Specialized in Medical Negligence
hero.subtitle: A law firm with history, serving the patient
hero.description: We are a multidisciplinary firm with a track record since 1946, specialized in medical negligence. We listen to you, analyze your situation and guide you with honesty and professional rigor.

intro.title: A Law Firm with History, Dedicated to the Patient
intro.description: With roots dating back to 1946, our firm has developed a strong specialization in medical negligence. We understand that behind every case there is a person who deserves to be heard, understood and defended with rigor and professional nobility.
intro.feature1Description: Decades of experience in healthcare law and patient defense
intro.feature2Description: Every case is unique. We listen to you and analyze your situation carefully
intro.feature3Description: Thorough analysis with specialized medical experts in each area
intro.feature4Description: We guide you throughout the entire process, keeping you informed at every step

services.title: Types of Medical Negligence
services.subtitle: Specialized knowledge in all areas of healthcare law

process.title: A Transparent and Close Process
process.subtitle: We accompany you at every stage, with clarity and honesty

step1.title: We Listen to You
step1.description: In a first consultation, we listen to your case carefully. We understand what you have experienced and analyze the situation.

step2.title: Rigorous Analysis
step2.description: We study the medical documentation with specialized experts to determine if there was malpractice.

step3.title: Honest Assessment
step3.description: We clearly explain your options, case viability and possible courses of action.

step4.title: Negotiation
step4.description: We seek an out-of-court solution when possible, avoiding a lengthy process.

step5.title: Legal Defense
step5.description: If necessary, we defend your case in court with the utmost professionalism.

step6.title: Support
step6.description: We are with you throughout the process, keeping you informed and answering your questions.

team.title: Professionals Committed to the Patient
team.subtitle: A team with vocation and extensive experience in healthcare law

cta.title: Need Guidance on Your Case?
cta.description: We are here to listen to you. Tell us your situation and we will give you an honest assessment, without obligation.
